title: website: CSS for definition list & terms is bad
body:
https://golang.org/doc/install/source has a <dl> with <dt> and <dd> elements in it. But it doesn't get rendered in the normal way. Instead, it's all flat:

![dl](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2621/12597583/92401488-c43a-11e5-8e51-6e7dc02820eb.png)

(see the arch list, amd64 ...)
